titles.title: Aviation Biometric Badge Act
To amend title 49, United States Code, to improve airport security by using biometric security badges, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 1/7/2003--Introduced. Aviation Biometric Badge Act - Amends Federal aviation law to direct the Under Secretary of Transportation for Security to require by regulation that each security screener (or employee who has unescorted access, or may permit other individuals to have unescorted access, to an aircraft or a secured area of the airport) be issued a biometric security badge that identifies a person by fingerprint or retinal recognition.
